  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Description: RESPONDER GOT CALL FOR A LEAKER IN THE LOAD. ARRIVED AND NOTICED THAT IT WAS A HAZMAT. USED THE DECISION TREE AND FLIPPED TO THE RIGHT PAGE AND PUT ON OUR PROPPER PPE. ONCE CLEANED, RESPONDER TOOK TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
